Lock Transaction Handler
[Programming Utilities]

Detailed Description

A utility module for implementing lock transactions.


Functions

HRESULT doLockTransaction (PB *packetBlock, uint32 *reg, uint32 *oldValue, uint32 lockTypesAllowed, uint32 *modifyMask)
 Perform a lock transaction.

Function Documentation

HRESULT doLockTransaction (  PB *  packetBlock,
uint32 *  reg,
uint32 *  oldValue,
uint32  lockTypesAllowed,
uint32 *  modifyMask
) 
 

Perform a lock transaction.

Will do the lock transaction on the register specified. The lock response is not sent.

Possible error return values:

E_LOCK_TYPE_NOT_IMPLEMENTED E_LOCK_TYPE_NOT_ALLOWED E_LOCK_TYPE_INVALID E_LOCK_TRANSACTION_INVALID

Typical usage of this function from a txl calledback function

  • pbGetDestinationOffset
  • determine register
  • get semaphore for register
  • doLockTransaction
  • txlSendLockResponse
  • put semaphore for register

NB: if LT_ALLOW_64 is specified, reg, oldValue, and modifyMask must point to 64 bit structures (consecutive quadlets)

Parameters:
packetBlock pointer to an incoming packet block
reg pointer to the register to do the lock transaction on
oldValue pointer to a holder for the old value of reg
lockTypesAllowed a bit field of LT_ types indicating what lock types are allowed.
modifyMask A 1 in the bit position indicates that bit can be modified.
Returns:
NO_ERROR (0) or an error code.
